name: Horizon's Pull
description:
Horizon's Pull is the finished product of a semester of work by the Video Game Development Association at Cal State Long Beach. Explore space, choose your path, and try to uncover the secrets of your mission.

REGAIN YOUR MEMORIES:

Interact with your only companion, a mysterious on-board AI, and uncover the details of your mission.

CHOOSE YOUR PATH:

Branching dialogue lets you choose how to proceed (and how your journey will end).

USE YOUR SURROUNDINGS:

Make paths, solve puzzles, and fight using the ship's tractor beam.

EXPLORE THE UNKNOWN:

Navigate across asteroid fields, through ship graveyards, and even to the ends of the galaxy as you search for a way home.
